Master Fee Schedule

The City of Caldwell has adopted the following fees:

* [2023-2024 Master Fee Schedule](javascript:;)
* [TABC Licenses and Permit Fees](javascript:;) - City of Caldwell Fees are in the far right column under "Maximum Local Fee"

As the financial epicenter of our vibrant city, our department is committed to providing exceptional financial services to support the growth and well-being of our community. We offer a comprehensive range of services tailored to meet the diverse needs of residents, businesses, and government entities. From budget planning and forecasting to investment management and debt administration, we work diligently to ensure transparency, efficiency, and accountability in all financial matters.

Our commitment is to provide support services in a professional and efficient manner to achieve high levels of productivity and customer satisfaction.

As stewards of public funds, integrity and ethical conduct are at the core of our operations. We uphold the highest standards of financial management, adhering to regulatory guidelines and industry best practices. Our commitment to transparency and accountability ensures that taxpayer dollars are utilized efficiently and responsibly.

**Acting as a point of contact for all financial services:**

* Preparing annual City budget and financial statement documents
* Providing assistance to customers needing utility services to include water, sewer, and solid waste
* Processing payments for vendors of the City
* Processing and Reporting Hotel Occupancy Tax
* Maintaining records of daily transactions
* Completing bi-weekly employee payroll

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
